name: Fragile Little World
description:
Check out the video and have fun building an eco system.

The BOD system is broken which breaks the mission of the game to complete BOD and regain energy in order to gather resources so I just made gathering take no energy. 

Essentially you can create an ecosystem that spawns resources and you can collect them.

Unfortunately I wasn't able to downsize my textures and meshes in time so the package is quit large and really slow running :(

There will be an updated version once the voting has ended.
